history.description: Initialized IronRoot framework, created manifest, reflex, and memory scaffolds
Created SQLite insert/fetch logic for manifest, reflex_registry, memory_log, and boot_report tables
Tested full DB lifecycle, validated bootstrap, encoding enforcement, log memory trace propagation, CLI/reflex event coverage
Implemented trace spine: trace_logger, reflex_trace_ping, trace_inspector; enforced memory + trace dual logging
Compliance Guard + Phase Trace Report scaffolding; systemwide scans for phase-lock and dual-logging adherence
